entry.title: libsecp256k1 0.7.1 released
entry.summary:
The latest version of libsecp256k1, version 0.7.1, has been officially released and is now available for download and use. This new release focuses on several key areas to enhance its functionality and security. Among the improvements included in this version are a minor security enhancement, the introduction of a new testing framework, and updates to the build system. These changes aim to streamline the development process and ensure a higher degree of security for users of the library.
For those interested in exploring the specifics of what has been updated or changed in this release, a comprehensive changelog is provided. This document details the modifications and improvements made, allowing developers and users to understand the scope of the update fully. The changelog can be accessed directly through the provided link.
This announcement was made to subscribers of the Bitcoin Development Mailing List as part of the ongoing efforts to keep the community informed about important updates and developments. For more information on the release and to download the latest version of libsecp256k1, interested parties are encouraged to visit the official release page on GitHub.
